name: io.bytes.per.checksum
relevant log: 1-ERROR	Thread Thread[eventHandlingThread,5,main] threw an Exception.org.apache.hadoop.HadoopIllegalArgumentException: Invalid checksum type: userOpt=null, default=CRC32C:0, effective=null
explanation: The configuration 'io.bytes.per.checksum' is set to 0 which is causing the Invalid checksum type error. This configuration should be set to a value greater than 0 to avoid this error.

name: yarn.nodemanager.disk-health-checker.min-free-space-per-disk-mb
explanation: The configuration 'yarn.nodemanager.disk-health-checker.min-free-space-per-disk-mb' is set to 0. This could potentially cause disk space related issues as it does not leave any free space on the disk.

name: yarn.resourcemanager.fs.state-store.num-retries
explanation: The configuration 'yarn.resourcemanager.fs.state-store.num-retries' is set to 0. This could potentially cause issues as it does not allow any retries in case of failures.
